actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that an applicant for old-age, wife's, husband's, or child's insurance benefits who under present law does not qualify for a benefit for the first month in which he or she meets the applicable entitlement conditions shall be entitled to a prorated benefit for that month.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide that an applicant for old-age, wife's, husband's, or child's insurance benefits who initially qualifies for such benefits for only a part of the first month in which he or she meets entitlement conditions shall be entitled to a prorated benefit for such month.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that an applicant for old-age, wife's, husband's, or child's insurance benefits who under present law does not qualify for a benefit for the first month in which he or she meets the applicable entitlement conditions shall be entitled to a prorated benefit for that month.
